snippet.title: BattleTech customization on the Argo - PC Gaming Show 2017
snippet.description:
A look at BattleTech's ship, the Argo, with some development footage. 

Official site: http://www.battletechgame.com

More from the PC Gaming Show here: http://www.pcgamer.com/watch-pc-gaming-show-2017-e3-livestream/
